features: Powers away 24- hour stuck-on messes in just one wash, with no pre-wash needed.
Free & Clear is Cascade's only dye-free liquid top, with no heavy perfumes. It's free of chlorine bleach and free of phosphates.

Running the dishwasher daily saves water* Save up to 20 gallons of water per dishwasher load when you skip the pre-wash *ENERGY STAR certified dishwashers use 4 gallons per cycle. Running the tap for 11 minutes handwashing uses up to 24 gallons of water.
#1 Recommended Brand in North America* *More dishwasher brands in North America recommend Cascade based on co-marketing agreements vs. other automatic dishwasher detergent brands
Convenient, premeasured ActionPac with no finicky plastic wrapping. Phosphate free.
body.description: Cascade Free & Clear dishwasher detergent pods are designed to be free of heavy perfumes, dyes, and chlorine bleach, while still delivering the powerful clean you expect from Cascade. Cascade Free & Clear powers away 24- hour stuck-on messes in just one wash, with no pre-wash needed. That's because every ActionPac is formulated with the grease-fighting power of Dawn. It dissolves fast to start cleaning right away, releasing the soaking power of Dawn dishwashing liquid and food-seeking enzymes that latch on and break down food into particles so small they can flow right down the drain. Free & Clear is Cascade's only dye-free liquid top, with no heavy perfumes. It's free of chlorine bleach and free of phosphates. Save up to 20 gallons of water per dishwasher load when you skip the pre-wash *ENERGY STAR certified dishwashers use 4 gallons per cycle. Running the tap for 11 minutes handwashing uses up to 24 gallons of water. Cascade is the #1 Most Recommended Brand in North America* *More dishwasher brands in North America recommend Cascade based on co-marketing agreements vs. other automatic dishwasher detergent brands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans without making my dishes taste like fake lemon
reviews.reviewText: For the most part anything I put in the dishwasher is metal, glass, or ceramic, but I do have some silicone heat-proof spatulas that I put in there and normal dishwashing packs/detergent just makes them taste like fake lemon soap after a while. It taints food and is just gross. NOT EVERYTHING HAS TO SMELL LIKE SOMETHING. SCENTED ≠ CLEANThese have solved that issue. They clean just as well as the platinum packs and don't leave my silicone utensils with fake lemon concentrate embedded in them. I wish they were actually completely unscented, but at least the scent that is included is just lemon extract and fades away quickly enough

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend switching to this from regular Cascade. We've been using Cascade pods for many years and were never bothered by it because the cleaning power is great, but once we had a baby and started washing silicon plates and cups in the dishwasher, we noticed it'd always leave a chemical scent that would not come off (tried boiling it in hot water, hand washing etc. but nothing worked so eventually decided to throw items out). Granted, silicon products retain smells we found out, but it made us wonder if there was another product out there that would work better and be safer. We tried other "free and clear" brands such as Seventh Generation, but those simply didn't clean our dishes well. This one cleans it really well and does not leave any strong scent on dishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does a great job!
reviews.reviewText: Gets my dishes very clean with no spots or streaks and without poluting. Contains no phosphates yet does a fabulous job, a double win for my dishes and for our environment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great clean every time
reviews.reviewText: Cleans great every time. Just as well as the other cascade products but without the smell. I’d give it 5 starts if it was actually free and clear. The box shows it contains colorants and fragrances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scent seemed to build with time
reviews.reviewText: When I first started using these, I didn't smell or taste the detergent at all. Now I'm eagerly waiting the end of the box so I can switch to a different brand. My whole kitchen smells like the detergent. It seems to cling especially badly to the plastic ware.I have 8 packets left. So excited for the end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Happiness is discovering a good, reliable dishwasher detergent that doesn't leave my dishes smelling like anything but clean. I have tried greener brands, but have not found one that cleans to my satisfaction. Cascade is reliable, and now blessedly unscented!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I was not sure if how well this would clean given that it does not have bleach and is non-phosphate but it CLEANS VERY WELL. I wish they would have a non-plastic container for the pods because even with recycling, cardboard is better for the environment. Scent is stronger than expected but fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wirecutter is right!
reviews.reviewText: Wirecutter says this is the best dishwasher detergent and they’re right. I thought I needed a new dishwasher until I tried Cascade. Not only does it clean my dishes, it also cleans the dishwasher tub.
